Text: Wow - Tack. Har inte s책 mycket Barber 채n, men det h채r 채r intressant.
Thanks! Could you put that in lossless-format (like e.g. FLAC) as well?

I didn't know that Barber had a long homosexual affair with composer Menotti. Reading a biography of him right now that is very interesting. Sheds a lot of light on his music. I think his Violin Concerto is his best work. What do you all think?
Of what I've heard (and it's not that much) the violin concerto is his supreme opus.
Many thanks - Barber is ok, well worth a place in the library.
